channel.title: CVE Feed for pyupio -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pyupio -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-39280|2024-08-03T12:00:43.472Z -- pyupio -- dparse
item.description: dparse is a parser for Python dependency files. dparse in versions before 0.5.2 contain a regular expression that is vulnerable to a Regular Expression Denial of Service. All the users parsing index server URLs with dparse are impacted by this vulnerability. A patch has been applied in version `0.5.2`, all the users are advised to upgrade to `0.5.2` as soon as possible. Users unable to upgrade should avoid passing index server URLs in the source file to be parsed.
